channel.title: Next Gen on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Next Gen on Stats On the T

item.title: Most Surprising Runs in Men's Open Era
item.description: In this guest post, Martin Ingram explores the stats behind surprising runs in tennis.

item.title: Match Dominance Among Next Gen
item.description: The US hard court season has been a breakout period for the ATP tour’s Next Gen players. In this post we look at which Next Gen players have been the most dominate this season.
